title: Biomass-based ionic liquids efficiently catalyzed the cycloaddition reaction of epoxides with CO2 by hydrogen-bonding and the anion cooperative effect
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00033A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kaixin Guo, Na Ji, Feng Han, Qingfeng Yang, Ning Wang, Chengxia Miao
Several novel biomass-based ionic liquids derived from 5-hydroxymethylfurfural were used as single-component, recyclable and efficient catalysts for transformation of CO2.
